verbs.description: [ARG1: i-270] [ARGM-TMP: temporarily] [V: closed] [ARGM-LOC: at mississippi river] [ARGM-PRP: for police situation] st louis mo — a police situation at the chain of rocks bridge caused a major traffic backup monday morning the illinois department of transportation said i-270 was closed in both directions at the mississippi river to deal with the situation illinois department of transportation chain of rocks bridge st louis missouri mississippi river
